name: Noa's Project
description: NOA’s PROJECT is a voxel rogue-lite stylish action game. Secret agent NOA fights against various types of enemies using katana and submachine gun. NOA challenges random generated dungeons to complete her secret missions.

name: Umbral Omen
description: Umbral Omen is a mystical puzzle game that generates a unique problem to decipher every time you play! Read the clues carefully in order to place the correct runes in the right spots and unravel the riddle of the Umbral Omen!

name: Isla Sinaloa
description: Isla Sinaloa is a relaxing game full of activities to enjoy on a peaceful island in a universe full of friendly animals

name: Galaxy Survivors
description: Shoot alien invaders, upgrade your ship, level up your weapons and save planets to defend against the invasion. Choose your favorite between the different unlockable ships and buy perks between your runs to ensure victory. After you triumph, hunt for achievements and ascend to save more universes

name: The Empress Quest: Full Moons Saga
description: Help Kobi the Dog to solve the secrets of his new house, find the Empress and return to his beloved Master with the help of mysterious Moon Mother. Immerse yourself in this whimsical adventure game with hand-painted backgrounds, quirky characters, light-hearted story and amazing music!

name: Arcade Waifu
description: A relaxing puzzle game with girls who love games.

name: Tank Top Tactics
description: 1 vs 1 tactical turn-based battle game with tanks

name: Paramount Hero
description: Inspired by multiplayer classics, Paramount Hero is a third-person skill-progression MMO with a fantasy world setting. Kill mobs, collect loot, hone your skills, complete quests, and cooperate with (or kill!) other players to become a legendary hero.

name: Table Ball
description: Table Ball by Lockyz Dev is the ultimate virtual arcade game! Compete against friends or the computer in exciting matches of top-down Ping Pong. This game is perfect for players of all skill levels. Start playing today and see if you have what it takes to come out on top!

name: New Super Mario Bros. Versus
description:
A unity-standalone 2-10 player remake of the Mario vs. Luigi gamemode from the New Super Mario Bros DS download game.

Includes the 5 default levels (Grassland, Bricks, Castle, Pipes, and Ice), along with a handful of custom levels to battle on! All power-ups are included and remain faithful to their original counterparts, along with the new addition of the Propeller Suit & Ice Flower!

name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails in the Dawn M
description: Sin descripción

name: Teimeo kiugi: deuraegon sonyeo RPG
description: Sin descripción

name: My Little Forest
description: Sin descripción

name: Prince of Persia: Harem Adventures
description: Prince of Persia: Harem Adventures is a mobile game made in J2ME platform released as a part of promotion/marketing for the Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time. The plot of the game is loosely based on the original Prince of Persia from 1989 and even varies slightly between its own monochrome and color versions.

name: Neko Puzzle
description: Leap around randomly generated puzzles collecting blocks in the right order.

name: The Classrooms
description: The Classrooms is a procedural, liminal-space, found-footage, survival horror game. Explore The Classrooms and discover the various anomalies it contains; from malicious entities, to harmless oddities. And remember, it's different every time you play, so your found footage is uniquely yours.

name: Those Left Behind
description: A 3rd person action-horror zombie game with elements of survival, time management and base management.

name: Poseidon Kiugi: Bangchihyeong Aeksyeon RPG
description: Sin descripción

name: The Three Kingdoms: The Dynamic
description: Sin descripción

name: Hugungui Beopchik
description: Sin descripción

name: Genocide
description: Sin descripción

name: Eternal Diary
description: Sin descripción

name: Märchen Maze
description: The PC Engine and Sharp X68000 of Märchen Maze.

name: Wonder Boy
description: Wonder Boy was ported to the Sega Mark III/Master System video game console by Sega. The game is also known as Super Wonder Boy for its Sega Mark III release in Japan.

name: Stones Keeper: King Aurelius
description:
Stones Keeper uses a turn-based combat system, which lets you use environmental objects as protection against your enemies. As well as the ability to break some of the environmental objects down to move faster, which, in turn, opens up a lot of strategic possibilities.

You can customize your squad by recruiting new companions with multiple specializations, skills and weapon preferences. Missions and battles will be just as diverse: Command your warriors to besiege enemy settlements or defend yours, protect your order's churches, escort civilian wagons, lay siege to enemy castles, aid your allies, and capture new technologies to upgrade your castle.

name: Wonder Boy
description: The home computer port of Wonder Boy.

name: Wonder Boy
description: The first home version of Wonder Boy was released exclusively in Japan for the SG-1000 (Sega's first video game console) during the same year the arcade version was released. The game was released in a "My Card" format, which required the "Card Catcher" peripheral. Because of the severe hardware differences, the game was remade completely for the SG-1000 with an all new set of stages. Certain enemies, stages, and items were also omitted, such as the skateboard.

name: Wonder Boy in Monster World
description: The Master System port of Wonder Boy in Monster World is somewhat different. It features re-drawn graphics, fewer and shorter stages, and a complex password system (approximately 40 digits in length) rather than battery-backed save data.

name: Lethal Omen
description:
Based off Gemini Home Entertainment's video of the same name, Lethal Omen takes you further into the mysteries of The universe of Gemini Home Entertainment.

You are an unnamed protagonist, armed with nothing but a gun, inside the Moonlight Acres Family Camp.

name: Wonder Boy in Monster Land
description: The Sega Master System/Sega Mark III port of Wonder Boy in Monster Land.

name: Commandos 2 & 3: HD Remaster Double Pack
description: Two cult classics in one bundle! Awaiting your orders, Sir!

name: DeFi Land
description: DeFi Land is the place to enjoy a farming, fishing, gardening and other relaxing activities. Users can build their villages, interact with other players and NPCs to craft the most precious items, compete for the leaderboards and revive the inner farmers in them.

name: 80 Days & Overboard!
description: Sin descripción

name: Goat Simulator 3: Goat in a Box Edition
description:
Goat Simulator 3 is a brand new third-person sandbox adventure game in which you get to become the literal goat. Just like the first Goat Simulator, you'll need to headbutt, lick and triple-jump your way across the giant island of San Angora - this time with all new areas, challenges, and events to discover.

The Goat in a Box Edition includes:
- Gustom Goat Box.
- Goat Plushy.
- Steelbook.
- Game & Soundtrack Discs.
- Double Sided Poster.
- 3 Postcards.
- Pre-Udder Gear.
- 10 Remastered Skins and Gear from Goat Simulator, MMO Simulator, GoatZ, Waste of - Space and PayDay.
- OG 2014 Pilgor.
- Digital Soundtrack.
- 3D Printing Files (Only For PC).

name: Advent Calendar
description: 25 Days, 25 surprises, 25 games! Count down to Christmas and enjoy a new present every day! Christmas Advent Calendar is the ultimate holiday season experience!

name: Dead By Daylight: Resident Evil Collaboration Bundle
description: All characters from Resident Evil, in a single affordable DLC for Dead By Daylight!

name: Shatterline
description: Shatterline is an arena FPS with a roguelike co-op mode (Expedition) as well as several traditional PvP modes such as TDM, Conquest, Plant-the-Bomb, and Escort. Players can choose Operatives and an armory of weapons that can be customized via attachments. Set in the near future, where humanity faces a threat of cosmic proportions. Players take on the roles of the Immunes – bearers of an extremely rare genetic combination that allows their bodies to resist the alien plague.

name: Omega Strikers
description: Smash opponents off the arena and score goals in this lightning-fast 3v3 free-to-play game. Squad up with friends and choose from a growing cast of colorful Strikers to sling slimes, toss tofu, and rocket boost to victory.

name: Freight Hopper
description: A fast paced platformer where you jump from train to train!

name: JumpStart Kindergarten
description: JumpStart Kindergarten is a grade-based JumpStart game released by Knowledge Adventure in 1997. It teaches a kindergarten curriculum. It is an updated version of JumpStart Kindergarten (1994), and in 2002 it was succeeded by JumpStart Advanced Kindergarten.

name: Wonder Boy: The Dragon's Trap
description: The Game Gear port of Wonder Boy: The Dragon's Trap, a direct sequel to Wonder Boy in Monster Land, you wander through the lands using multiple forms that each have different abilities. Each defeated boss unlocks a new form that has to be used to advance to a new area, while shops give you access to new equipment for money.

name: Faithful Backrooms
description: The mod that extends the regular Minecraft experience, adding in over 20 Backrooms levels to the game, coupled with progression, advancements, and lots of entities and terrifying environments to discover.

name: Wonder Boy: Monster Land
description: A cell phone port of Wonder Boy: Monster Land released only in Japan.

name: Wonder Boy
description: A cell phone port of Wonder Boy, released only in Japan.

name: Neave 2
description: Explore the world of Neave 2 as you hunt for magical floating cubes. If you're feeling competitive, race for the fastest time to claim a top spot on the leaderboard.

name: Big Ice Tower Tiny Square
description: Sin descripción

name: Truco
description: This game is a digital version of the traditional card game "Truco", originally from Argentina. It is the first Argentine video game.

name: The Descent
description: A fantasy rogue-like shooter game set below the crust of the Earth.

name: Elf Girl Pinball
description: More than just a "very happy" pinball game~!

name: Mine Boss Simulator
description: "Mine Boss Simulator", as the name suggests, is a game that simulates a mine boss. It is also the sequel to "Lick Dog Simulator".

name: Meikyuu Machi no Grace
description: Grace, a powerful swordsman with huge debts, joined the labyrinth exploration in order to solve the problem of money, and unavoidably helped men with sex-related services. A degenerate roguelike game where men get married and have children!

name: The Apocryphal Gensoukyou
description: Sin descripción

name: Wilderness Survival: The Conservationist
description: Introducing the first ever simulation game where you can manage game animals on your properties, and boost their genetics by buying better quality animals to breed with your herd. Try to maintain a decent population while protecting them from natural predators.

name: Warp Lab
description: Experience seamless portal gameplay mechanics in VR. Warp Lab allows you to take full advantage of immersive player-controlled portals across a diverse array of puzzle, combat, and sandbox levels.

name: World of Talesworth: Idle MMO Simulator
description: Explore new lands, slay monsters, gather loot and level up in this idle MMO simulation experience. Packed with unique and meaningful upgrades, moments of discovery, and gaming nostalgia, World of Talesworth is an homage to all our favorite RPGs.

name: 4 The Elements
description: 4 The Elements is a 2D Action Platformer inspired by the best games of this genre from the 90s. Switch in real time between the four elements of nature to overcome challenges, acquire new abilities and defeat powerful bosses in beautifully crafted thematic stages.

name: 1001 Jigsaw: Legends of Mystery 6
description: Otherworldly forces exist. You can make sure of this by putting together the puzzle pieces from the new game Legends of Mystery 6.

name: AimX
description: Free aim trainer for all FPS & TPS players. AimX adapts to your game so you can improve in the most efficient way.

name: A Hero's Rest
description: Immerse yourself into a fantasy world as the proprietor of a small town in a world abounding with Heroes and monsters. Build shops, craft items with hundreds of customization options and manage your resources wisely while making sure to ward off the dangers that surround the land of Felonia.

name: Burn the Witch
description: THEY TOLD ME TO MAKE THE BURN THE WITCH. ROGUELIKE IN THE DARK FANTASY SETTING. I'M NOT AGAINST IT

name: Ambulance Chauffeur Simulator
description: You have a green light from the police, because you have to break any traffic rule to do your job well. The more lives saved, the cleaner your karma will be. Always be prepared because the call can come at any time!

name: Arc Intelligence
description: Arc Intelligence is an adventure strategy game for the PC about an artificial intelligence that tries to take over the world. What would you do if your mind was inside a computer? Do you have what it takes to become the arch intelligence in this arced adventure?

name: Bad Chicken
description: Bad Chicken is a retro styled sideway scrolling shoot-em-up inspired by the retro classics. It takes place in 8 locations in the Ferrus system, each one with different challenges, and dangers.

name: B.I.N.D.
description: An overwhelming scenario volume equivalent to three light novels! The love-hate drama between a new female guard, a prisoner, and a senior guard is finally complete!

name: Cache Overload
description: Cache Overload is a fast-paced multi-player FPS taking place in Earth, 2041, as robots. Battle with your friends or other robots on the globe inside various maps and game modes.

name: DinoLife
description:
DinoLife is a Dinosaur farming game with Life-Sim elements.

You are able to create, hatch and look after many Dinosaurs, while making money to expand, buy upgrades or gifts for the residents so you can become friends.

Or you may just want to save and keep personalising your room and house with items you collect while playing.

name: Echo: Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
The deluxe edition of Echo on steam that includes the game and all 30 DLC packs.

The items in these DLC packs are mostly available in game normally at various drop rates or exclusive booster items for character experience and weapon proficiency.

name: Hunteroids
description: Our cities are being attacked by meteorites & you are the only one able to protect us! However, your weapon can only destroy one type of meteorite... Create bubbles in the sky & transform all meteorites until they have the right shape, colour & rotation before exploding!

name: Rogue Blight
description: Rogue Blight is a souls-like, rogue-lite, combat focused RPG. Fight your way through ever-changing maps. Customize your playstyle based on what you find. Meet other struggling heroes. Death will be punishing, but you will get stronger with every journey. Are you up for the challenge?

name: Entanglement
description: Can one illustrate the invisible? These artists try. Entanglement is an artwork interpreting an unexplained phenomenon of quantum physics. The viewer contemplates revolving sequences of intricate visuals matched with spatialized audio. Based on a live show by France Jobin & Markus Heckmann.

name: Valete vos viatores
description: The ancient Romans erected their tombs and mausoleums along the roads so that travelers could read the inscriptions on their tombstones. The player will be able to learn the techniques used for their realization in the person of a scriptor titulorum.

name: WalkBot
description: Play through this short story of WalkBot. Solve puzzles using the unique body-switching mechanic to progress and see the story unfold.

name: The Packages
description: A puzzle game with great challenges and enjoyable environment. Simple and intuitive with easy interactions.

name: They Came From the Sky 2
description:
Terror from space throws world into panic! Yes, again... Your mission: Save the Earth from mankind and make a delicious juicy Human Smoothie!

A fast paced arcade game wherein you take the role of one of the giant alien robot. The game offers over 20 types of enemies, and 50 hidden artifacts to discover.

name: The Utility Room
description: This VR Journey takes you to the 'behind the scenes' of the Universe. Beyond a door lies a barren landscape inhabited by strange stonefaced beings. Here, the maintenance and heavy lifting required keeps existence stable and temporal. You are a tourist. Don't do anything foolish.

name: The Sun of Broken Euphoria
description: Have you ever heard of the space-time continuum? And have you ever had the luck (or misfortune) to be alone with the laws of time? Two completely ordinary teenagers got into an unequal deadly battle of a mysterious pioneer camp, where every situation is like a shot, and a word is a projectile.

name: The Last Trophy
description: A space explorer receives a strange signal from an unknown planet. What is in this place? Help Mell discover the mysteries of this new land in this retro platformer with an arcade feel.

name: The Highrise
description: THE HIGHRISE is a first-person survival game set in a high-rise building that has been sealed off by an alien monster invasion. Gather resources to make fighting weapons and survival tools. You must find and send a rescue signal at the end of your desperate survival.

name: The Cute Fighter
description: The universe of the game takes us to the world of anime and fantasy characters, dynamic battles, beautiful locations from cities, clubs, streets of Tokyo to the steppes of Afghanistan. The story tells us about the struggle between the world of anime and fantasy, choose your side.

name: The Coroner Saga: Episode 5 - Life Paths
description: While the Coroner Institute grapples with various murder investigations, Sara attempts to figure out where her heart lies. Thomas's trip abroad provides the young doctor something else to be concerned about while the institution solves several homicide cases.

name: The Absolute Destroyer
description: Have you ever thought about a superpower you could have?

name: Talking Dogs
description: you play as Phil The Husky in this dog adventure game set in a peaceful place called Dreams Island, you will explore and try to find your best friend Glen who went missing from his hometown of dog-town

name: Somnipathy
description: What would you endure for a good night’s sleep? Find out in this point-and-click adventure thriller by guiding Aggy through a world where not all nightmares are dreams. Fight surreal monsters and help strange people... but can you preserve your sanity? The answers lie in Somnipathy...

name: SpellSlingers
description: Cut down Thousands of enemies, from the undead to the mysterious creatures of the night to save the world from the impending doom, Spellslingers is a Fantasy Rogue-lite where you fight hordes of enemies with casual elements.

name: Spellstruck
description: Face off in the ultimate showdown of elemental magic in Spellstruck. A game of tactical and reactive, arena style combat on randomised maps. Curve spells through the air, deflect attacks and combine an ever-growing list of unique abilities to defeat your rivals.

name: Star Boy and The Captain of Outer Space
description: Star Boy and the Captain of Outer Space is a On Rails Sci-Fi Space Shooter Adventure from Not Unlike Games! Featuring light Third Person Shooter element, Multiple Playable Characters, and a Dynamic Story!

name: Starcube MMO
description: an open world subculture urban MMORPG what kills the bad orcs that invaded Sun Street, A city of dreams and happiness

name: Station 37
description: Station 37 is a retro style immersive sim where you piece together the mystery of what happened to this once great space station. Solve puzzles, fight aliens and security bots, and explore the world.

name: Steel Saviour Reloaded
description: Steel Saviour is back! Try yourself at this revised 16: 9 version of a cult side scrolling shooter.

name: Stunning Policewoman
description: This is a city full of crime, the player as a stunning policewoman, criminals arrested and detained in the police station.

name: Super Island Survival
description: An action adventure cartoon sequel, thrilling monster challenges, gorgeous exploration career, meet expectations

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Furniture
description: Puzzles of furniture!

name: SuuubWaaay
description: Try to survive as long as you can in the SuuubZone, something is always watching you, and you should make sure you're always watching it.

name: Swords and Sorcery: Sovereign
description: Swords and Sorcery - Sovereign is the sequel to Underworld, a party-based, first person view role-playing game with turn-based combat and a square grid 3D environment. The art was made by a professional comics illustrator.

name: Synesthesia
description: Is there an escape to the endless spiral? 『Synesthesia』 is a multi-route sci-fi mystery visual novel. Follow a group of college students with unique cognitive abilities who soon learn something is amiss at the institute sworn to help them, leading to implications larger than they ever imagined.

name: Tales of Vaalundr
description: Tales of Vaalundr is a side scrolling, action/adventure rpg with a rich story line and fun player class choices!

name: Skystrike: Wings of Justice
description: Use your falcon powers to soar, smash and stealth your way to victory against the RatKing’s army in this hometown hero adventure!

name: Slingshot Adventure
description: After making a slingshot Ralph decides to go on a journey between different scenarios to test his skills. Help him to overcome the challenges along his adventure.

name: Solas City Heroes
description: Become a hero in this sexy Beat 'em up with RPG elements and erotic content! Set your rules, customize your appearance, pick your talents and specials, and get ready to fight your way through dark alleys, night clubs and secret laboratories in your quest to save Solas City!

name: Fire Emblem: Heaven's Bloom
description:
The story begins in the Kingdom of Adestria. Hundreds of years ago, Humans competed for survival with magically gifted beings known as 'Fae'. Over time, a breed of 'Half-Bloods' emerged, descended from parents of each race. The Half-Bloods chose to ally themselves with the weaker Humans, and the Fae were destroyed. The Half-Bloods then turned on the humans, using the powers of their Fae blood to subjugate and enslave their magically-inert cousins.

A little over a hundred years have passed since the subjugation. Our main characters are two Half-Bloods: Lord Cassius Malberry and his sister, Fordra. Hoping to find the cure for a horrible disease, they hunt for an ancient Fae tome...

name: Rifters
description: Play online with 2 to 4 players as you collect the minions you need to defeat your enemies. Beware of the power your opponents can unleash upon your battlefield.

name: Room 1309
description: Can you escape from Room 1309? Strange ghosts haunt the rooms of the Hotel Orpheus. When you awake in Room 1309 you'll have to solve puzzles and find clues to make it out alive! Room 1309 is Chapter 1 of the Hotel Orpheus series.

name: Save Daddy Trump 3: Rise of Evil
description: after many years the peace has been disturbed in Peaceland. New army has captured Daddy Trump again. Now Kiki Trump is more powerful than ever and need meet new very powerful enemy and his army to save daddy Trump again in this low poly RPG game

name: Screaming Noppy
description: Control your character with different sounds, dodge traps, solve little puzzles, and create fun levels that will make your friends nervous

name: Sears: The Sky Frontier
description: Sears: The Sky Frontier is a beautiful and epic real-time strategy game that puts you at the head of an army of little stone men against formidable invaders, smartly planning the battle and leading the defense in unique and atmospheric locations.

name: Retro Invasion
description: If you like retro games, then Retro Invasion is the right place for you. The game mechanics are simple and quick for everyone to understand. It is a retro designed shooter.

name: Reforger
description: Reforger is a unique RTS where you do not control, but instead guide and outfit units in a spin on classic RTS. Fend off hordes of orcs hell-bent on destroying your base, regain control of your time machine to return to your future, and put an end to the conflict once and for all!

name: Redhot Rabbit
description: 1922...The Big Apple...Mugsy's turf got plucked by a gang of trouble boys. The ever-lovin' jazz rabbit is gonna jump on heads and clip those goons. He'll bop his way to the biggest boss and take back what's his or get zotzed, ya' follow? Soundtrack is the bee's knees - truly hep and jake.

name: Under A New Sun
description: While searching for a new home, an unexpected failure in your ship has left you stranded on a planet surprisingly similar to Earth. Discover a vast open world, hunt for food, develop technologies, and build yourself a new home to survive!

name: Pocket Tank
description: 'Pocket Tank' is a two-player tank battle game that requires two people to play.

name: Playback Trauma: In Sickness
description: You have just woken up from a coma and need to reach the Jersey Shore immediately. You have no car, no money, and no pants. Take an ordinary hitchhike across New Jersey on an extraordinary night, and try to reach your destination in one piece

name: Pirates: Golden tits - Chapter 1
description: Pirates: Golden tits: Chapter 1 is an explicit pirate simulator. You get to control a young pirate captain, who has just acquired his first ship.

name: Pimp My Cruise
description: So you wanna be a businessman? Get fast money in an easy way? For some crazy reason you want it to be related to the sea? You've come to the right place! You only need to... Pimp my Cruise!

name: Percy Parcel
description: VR Warehouse Survival Action. Stock shelves to survive a week in the warehouse.

name: Pep-Pel
description: Run through each level as Pep-Pel! a goofy red goblin thing. In this beautifully hand drawn game. play through tons of fast-paced and difficult levels, each with there own challenge to master!

name: Over the Speed Limit
description: Test your racing skills with this challenging racing game . Customise your car , make it look better and faster and test it to a drag race . Be the first to cross the finish line in different racing classes .

name: Kirby's Halloween Adventure
description:
An all-new romhack of Kirby's Adventure! A level modification romhack that changes all the different levels into brand spookier zones. Features plenty of brand new tilesets with new level themes (Graveyard, Wild West, Art Gallery, Circus, Temple, Volcano, Factory, etc) combined in a brand new experience!

Feature multiple reskinned enemies to match the Halloween setting, including multiple variations per enemy! (Example: Bronto Burts can be Booler ghosts, Flapper bats, be Mumbies, etc), and plenty of other surprises you shall see!

name: Nebula
description: Clean a galaxies from thousands of invaders! Nebula is an action, space shooter where your choices are making you progressively stronger against the endless waves of space enemies.

name: Outer Darkness
description: Lay waste to hordes of evil in the Outer Darkness. Learn and augment spells and upgrade your character's abilities. Unlock and harness 8 different elements with unique gameplay to escape the forsaken dominion.

name: Oblige of Chaos
description: 2D art and 3D action. Elemental Reactions. Not too big Open World. Battle , Puzzle and Explore. Life has no save point.

name: Notes From Province
description: Dive into a deep Open World that rewards exploration. Solve clever puzzles with lateral thinking, and engage in unique, story-driven boss battles. Then take a break. Furnish your home, fish a little, and chill with your eccentric neighbors.

name: Nonogram: Kawaii Cuties
description: This game, called "Nonogram", is a logic puzzle that correctly fills the squares from the given hints. Solve the puzzles and complete the "cute" picture!

name: Night Gate
description: Night Gate is the result of crossing an open-world Castlevania with the action of Resident Evil. You play as a Vampire Hunter on a quest to kill the Master Vampire, Grendel! Set in the swamps of the American South, take your Airboat to explore in a 20+ hour open-world RPG horror game.

name: Nick Bounty: The Goat in the Grey Fedora - Remastered
description: A complete modern remaster of the award winning Point & Click detective comedy adventure game.

name: Nightmares of the death
description: Nightmares of the death it's a psychological horror game in which you will be exploring an unknown place as client 101 while learning the truth of why you are in this place collecting the memories of who you used to be.

name: NekoNecro
description: Run! Jump! Double jump! Pounce and bounce! Meow! A fast-paced 2D platformer with a beautiful hand-drawn 90's graphic novel style.

name: Moth Lake
description: Moth Lake is a story-driven adventure game. It's a horror/comedy experience, with a lot of textual contents (more than 20k words), and hundreds of different scenes (more than 300 scenarios). Main aspects: dialogs, story structure, puzzle solving, exploration, player choices, stealth action.

name: Mosaics Galore: Glorious Journey
description: Mosaics Galore. Glorious journey. 100 magical mosaics await you!

name: Monster Girl Dormitory
description: “Monster Girl Dormitory”is a decryption game, find items according to the hints on the character to complete the decryption.

name: Midnight Saga: The Monster
description: When a quiet Halloween night turns into a thrilling adventure, make sure to grab a weapon, eat candy, wreck monsters or leave them for dead!

name: Light
description: The protagonist is to commemorate the Syrian boy on the beach, control the character to escape and solve mysteries in my fictional inner world, understand the worldview of the game and the cruelty of past wars during this period, and finally make their own real choices.

name: Kube
description: Kube is a 2D platformer where you'll have to think in 3D. Your perspective will change, but remember: gravity always pushes downward! Run, jump, and swim around a multitude of cubes. Meet creatures, avoid traps and solve puzzles in this game where each world you visit introduces fresh new mechanics.

name: Krimzon hoard
description: Experience a frenetically paced wave based hoard game, Play the one room challenge mode to learn the gun skills and surviving to high rounds and then Explore and find your way through the multiple levels of the campaign.

name: Little Legion
description: Little Legion is a fast-paced top-down shooter in space where you command an ever-expanding fleet of drones to battle through waves and defeat powerful bosses, with upgrades and level-ups along the way to help you conquer stronger and stronger challenges.

name: Lord of the Imps
description: Lord Of The Imps is a survival strategy game. Build, gather resources, expand, defeat your enemies and Regain your position as the ruler of hell.

name: Magneko
description: Magneko is a casual platform game. in the cute handmade toy world, you can jump or use the magnet magic to move, solve puzzles and collect dried fish to pass the levels. With a simple mouse click, you can use magic and begin your adventure.

name: Magus Pocus
description: A 2D platform action adventure game. With medieval fantasy setting. Composed of 9 phases divided into 2 stages and at the end of each stage a boss. With simple and fun movement where you defeat your enemies by jumping on them or using your magic sword. The game will provide you with hours of fun.

name: Pokémon Grand Colosseum
description:
Grand Colosseum not only acts as a difficulty hack to one of the hardest pokemon games out there, but brings a host of QOL changes, including but not limited to

- Physical/Special split

- Fairy type

- 65 New moves

- Stat/type/Ability updates and changes (In line with Drayano's hacks)

- Revamped TM list with 8 new TMs

- Infinite TM use

- New shadow encounters

- Gym themed Colosseum battles

- Higher difficulty

- Alolan Ninetales and Marowak

- Different versions based on which set of starters/legendary trio you want

name: Memory Puzzle: Futanari Boss
description: Train your brain with this memory game, revealing the naughty sexual adventures of a Futanari boss and her co-workers at the office, in images hidden behind pairs of cards which you have to match.

name: Kach
description: On a task to find your sister, you find yourself exploring an old abandoned house. But you soon find out that things are not as they seem.

name: Kakudo
description: Kakudo is a maze exploration and adventure game. As a small humanoid named Tamashi, you will escape labyrinths while collecting as many coins as possible and beating your personal high scores. Complete all 50 puzzles to discover Kakudo's enigmatic story !

name: Kamibako: Mythology of Cube
description: "Crafting" x "Puzzles" x "Battle" x "RPG" !? A game system that evokes a unique new game genre that will give you a brand new experience. Become the "Restorer" who aims to save the world by finding solutions to the "great division" and "fragmentation", the world's...

name: Knight Solitaire 3

In addition to color, Pokemon and Trainer sprites have been imported from Pokemon Gold/Silver/Crystal, and so has the battle HUD. If you don’t want this, the “vanilla” patch does not touch these.

Also in each level, there is a blue coin as an extra challenge. Don't worry about collecting them all, since they aren't worth anything. You can always collect them at the end.

The dungeons can be beaten in numerous random orders. Any region can be explored from the start, and players can get a good advantage early on by venturing to certain areas first. The second quest is the total opposite and is entirely linear. There is no possible way to beat the dungeons out of order. Just know that if Darknuts or Wizzrobes are seen in the beginning, then save that dungeon for after the others. Play wisely, exploration is rewarded.

The game features an intense single player experience set on Mars in the 22nd century.
You are part of a crew on a mission to Mars. The plan is to land on Mars for exploration and colonization. The flight and landing were successful. During construction of a base something went wrong. There was an explosion, the base is destroyed. You are the only one who survived. A spacecraft used in the mission is undamaged. The goal is to get to the spacecraft and return to Earth. Earn coins and stars for completing levels, then use your coins to unlock in-game boosts and fun skins such as Ninja Chicken, Robot Chicken, and Chicken Zombie!
Supports saving to iCloud so you can save your game on one iOS device and pick it back up on another.

You will travel around the world collecting information and discover forgotten civilizations, myths, and ruins in the process. As you explore, you can sail, fight, and mini-games, recruit characters from all over the world as your companions, and customize your own ships.

name: Tetote x Connect
description: Tetote x Connect is an arcade rhythm game released by Taito. The game features a touch-screen interface, where players tap on the screen and follow the movements of their partner to dance to the rhythm! Players can customize their partners in a variety of accessories, and also play to numerous songs from anime, artists, and labels such as Sega, Vocaloid, anime openings, and many more!

name: Downfall
description: Quiet Haven Hotel was supposed to be just a one night shelter for Joe and Lucy Davis. But things soon start to go wrong. Lucy's panic attacks get worse and soon she disappears. And in the morning, the hotel changes too. Nothing is what it seems anymore. Joe is left alone, trying to understand what is happening, trapped between reality and this nightmare.

name: Yukari 108shiki: Heavenly Fantasia

name: Pocket Monster
description:
Pocket Monster is a NES platformer featuring Pikachu. It was also ported to the Game Boy Advance under the name Pokémon Gold Version.

This is a simple platformer, in which the player controls Pikachu. Compared to many other NES games, the controls are inverted, which means that jumping is done by pressing B, and pressing A while moving in a direction makes Pikachu run, and A on its' own clears every enemy on the screen. It's also possible to stomp on enemies, similarly to Super Mario Bros.. Pikachu can take three hits before losing a life, with the number of hits left represented by a Poké Ball counter on the top left corner of the screen. There are a total of four worlds (Velbt, Woods, Tableland, and Motte) which are split into three levels each, as well as a single-screen boss battle at the end of each. This game has a debug mode enabled by default, allowing the player free movement while paused and to skip to the next level by pressing Select. In some places, the player can fall partway into the ground, although this doesn't have any implications. The music also glitches slightly at certain points.

The background graphics are mostly ripped and slightly modified from Athena and Adventure Island II. Some of the enemies are also taken from various games, with some of them based on Pokémon. The sound engine was taken from Twin Bee, a game published and developed by Konami, and, while the game has a soundtrack of its' own, all the sound effects are still recognizably from Twin Bee - a setup similar to what Super Game and Gamtec used to have. The ending is Pikachu dancing with an "End" message at the top of the screen.

name: Deus Ex: Nihilum
description: DXN - Deus Ex: Nihilum is a 2013 total conversion mod for Deus Ex. Set in an Alternate Universe of Deus Ex in the year 2049, it follows the first nano-augmented UNATCO agent Mad Ingram as he heads to Hong Kong in order to solve the mystery of a terrorist attack committed in Shenzhen, and stumbles upon a conspiracy in the process.

A Game Mod and fan prequel to the 2000 game Deus Ex that was released in September 2011.

Daniel, a mechanically augmented mercenary, is set to infiltrate Human Horizon, a biotech firm in Washington, D.C.. What appears to be a simple data heist mission ends up going awry when Daniel hacks a computer and, just before blacking out, has a mysterious computer bot infiltrate his mind.

Two years later, Daniel is on the run from the agents of Human Horizon and MJ12, and is being given a mission by the bot to find out about the Titan program.

name: Touhou Mumyouken: Unorganized Heroes
