name: Ernie's Big Splash
description:
Ernie's Big Splash is a 1986 Sesame Street video game starring Rubber Duckie. The goal was to create a series of connections, for Rubber Duckie to make his way to Ernie's bathtub. The game teaches basic logic, directions (North, South, East and West) and sequencing.

The video game was created by CBS Learning Systems, for ages four to six.

The game was originally made for DOS, but was released for the Nintendo Entertainment System in 1989. On NES, it was released on the cartridge Sesame Street ABC, supplementing Letter-Go-Round. At some point in time, the game was released for the Unisys ICON operating system, a platform commissioned by the Ontario education system. No copies of this format exist, as the last ICON computers and software were destroyed in the early-2000s.

name: Wiz Mud
description: An abandoned MUD (Multi User Dimension), unearthed by hackers in the year 2017 where you play as a wizard in a once lively MMO world. The new tenants of WizMud have taken to tossing priceless artifacts (old junk) from this forgotten MMO into the fishing pond, along with its conventions.

name: Ever Maiden
description: This story is about "Puerarium", a school isolated from the outside world by fog and thorns. Here strict discipline is always in effect, where the air always tense and time never disturbed. However, one morning a girl was found unconscious in front of the school gate. This gate is always closed and should only open on special occasions. The guards, on alert, asked her to name herself to which she replied "Alouette." At that moment, the bell of the clock tower, which was rusty and always silent, rang out. "When the bell of the clock tower rings, the end of this school will come soon."

name: Fuyukara, Kururu.
description:
"Eh?
What do you mean that Shihon-chan might die?
Eeh? Shihon-chan's head has gone missing?"

It seems Shihon-chan's headless body was found in the meditation room.

A murder isn't unusual, after all, there's at least one bloodthirsty killer at school.
Murdering people is fine and all but it's considered a taboo that must be never violated to decapitate and hide their head because one can never be revived if so.
If her head isn't found within two days, she'll really kick the bucket!

A boarding system school isolated from the outside world, and there do the immortal girls live.
The time it takes for them to become an adult is the same time it takes for them to deage and become a baby, they grow up until they become an adult once more and then do they deage again⁠—a cycle that's being repeated.

There's only one condition in order to graduate from school: one needed to be deemed a prodigy by someone observing from the outside. The moment that verdict be handed down, the girl's graduation would be recognized and she would disappear from school.

The immortal girls' peaceful school life would be greatly disturbed by a certain murder case.

name: Super Metroid: Nature
description:
Super Metroid Nature is a full-sized hack of the popular game Super Metroid. The design of the world, palettes, enemies and atmosphere is entirely different to the original story of Zebes.
The difficulty will resemble that of the original, but a tad harder in sections.
Nature, while resembling parts of the original, is a whole different experience, with new items, rooms, and ways to play.

name: Super Metroid: Biohazard
description:
The Space Pirates have leaked a deadly virus on the minor planet Dysnomia, Samus must recover 5 artifacts and put an end to their reckless schemes. Her suit has been outfitted to withstand and protect her from the virus that has begun to mutate organisms on the planet as well as the space pirates themselves. Watch out Samus, the pirates have been experimenting with antigravity technology. Be careful!

This hack was created for the Oats n Goats contest.

name: Caillou Preschool
description: In Caillou Preschool, children will learn by exploring their world with Caillou, the popular PBS cartoon character. Over 60 activities are here, teaching children all they'll need to know as they prepare for school and the outside world.

name: Super Metroid: Cryogenesis
description:
Suspicious Space Pirate activity has been detected by the Galactic Federation in the remote Tog'Tassano system and Samus is sent to check it out. Discover the truth of what's going on and power yourself up in this frigid, hostile environment.

Super Metroid: Cryogenesis is a romhack created for a streaming contest. This is the contest version with cleanup fixes from what was seen when it was streamed. More is planned and being worked on to expand, however that doesn't mean this should feel half complete. A compact adventure awaits you with a focus on clean, thematic visuals and unique level design.

name: Super Metroid: Lost World
description: "Super Metroid: Lost World" has a new planet, new enemies, huge areas… A must know wall jump and a mid-air morph. It's a game for all players with a mid level difficulty.

name: Kartoon Racing: Singleplayer Multiplayer Racing
description: Sin descripción

name: Little Noah: Scion of Paradise - Special Edition
description: This set includes the Little Noah: Scion of Paradise main game and the DLC 1+2 pass.

name: Extreme Bike X
description: This easy-to-master motocross racing game is fun for everyone! Pass around the Joy-Con controllers and play with up to four players! Try out each bike's special abilities and take your favorite to the courses!

name: Shadowverse: Champion's Battle - Legendary Edition
description: Introducing the Shadowverse: Champion's Battle Legendary Edition, bringing together the original strategic card battle game and the "Mythical Cards Premium Pass + 10 Levels" downloadable content.

name: Super Metroid: Polarity
description:
Super Metroid Polarity is an exploration romhack where black & white will be the main colors you will see ! Explore a contaminated planet where it draws its energy from gravity.
Collect a brand new weapon to control the polarity of gravity but beware, Samus can also be contaminated by the atmosphere and enemies and lose these HP as it is infected.

name: Cueist 2
description: Cueist 2 is the long-awaited sequel to the the original hit pool and snooker game for iOS. Play against a friend or challenge one of the CPU controlled players of increasing skill. Customizable tables, 8 selectable physics models (some serious, some not so much) and a wealth of opponents make this the perfect way to have a relaxing game of pool on your mobile device.

name: Duelstar
description: One button local multiplayer space melee!

name: Live Art
description: Hold to draw, avoid the obstacles, and bring the arts to life! Super easy to understand but very challenging and packed with tons of fun.

name: The Ascent: Cyber Heist
description: Completed The Ascent but are itching for more? Cyber Heist is for you! Solo or in co-op with your friends, take on new challenging missions, explore brand new environments, fight your way against new enemies, and experience new ways of fighting using melee weapons!

name: CosmoOdyssey: Trip to Mars
description: CosmoOdyssey: Trip to Mars is a first-person spaceship adventure with a special Ukrainian flavor.

name: Hidden Cube World Top-Down 3D
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Metroid: Scrolls 6
description: Metroid: Scrolls 6 is a full, open-ended Metroid Zero Mission hack. The hack has full graphical changes and a full original soundtrack. You can play and explore 7 full areas and might also find things never used in a hack before.

name: Metroid: Lost Chozo
description:
I crashed land on a strange planet due to the failure of the spacecraft, and Power Suit was completely damaged after impact. So, I had to explore this strange planet.
With custom music, environments, bosses and more!

name: Roberta Williams' King's Quest I: Quest for the Crown
description: An "enhanced" version of the first game in the King's Quest series released several years later which utilized the SCI (Sierra's Creative Interpreter) graphics engine. It also included other improvements such as sound card support (with a corresponding in-game soundtrack) as well as an expanded story which alters some aspects of the original gameplay as a result. This version was included in several King's Quest Collections over the years, often alongside the original version of the game.

name: Pokémon Vintage White
description:
Pokemon Vintage White is a difficulty hack of Pokemon White that includes only Pokemon from Gen 1-3. The Unova Starters have been replaced with the Hoenn Starters to fit this trend. A lot of Pokemon have recieved buffs in the form of stat changes, movepool changes, evolution changes, type changes, and much more.
Pokemon Vintage White also includes a lot of quality of life changes such as getting the Super Rod as soon as the adventure begins as well as getting early (usable) Cut, Stone evolutions for weird evolutions (i.e. Tyrogue now evolves into its evolutions based on the stone that you give it), accessible fossils, and much much more.

name: Reese's Snake
description: Reese's Snake is a playable advertisement based on the game Snake.

name: Quake: Coppertone Summer Jam 2
description: Suns out, guns out! The second annual Coppertone Summer Jam is a 22 (+start) map jam for the Copper mod (included) that peels Ranger out of the cold and dark, thrusting him into sunny and hot environments from veteran and new mappers alike!

name: My Fairytale Girlfriend
description:
You've always read stories to escape your mundane school life, but your world turns upside-down when a chance encounter with a magical bookmark summons three cute fairytale girls into the real world! Sound like a dream come true? Wait until you see what else has been unleashed...

It's your chance to become the knight in shining armor, save the world, and find true love along the way. Write your very own happily ever after in this magical and heartwarming tale of adventure and romance!

name: Devil Beauty & Animal Cuties!
description: Survive high school and find love with a beautiful devil and two half-animal cuties!

name: Save Her From the Zombies!
description: You're trapped in a mansion infested with zombies... Will you be able to protect the girl you love from certain death?!

name: Minnie Mouse Bow-tique: Super Surprise Party!
description: Lets your child help Minnie and Daisy turn digital ribbon, dazzles and glitter into beautiful bows for creative play.

name: LandBox
description:
A creative world. You can interact with the metaverse inside our mall. The mall will have ways for you to chat with friends and meet new metaverse enthusiasts. You can visit other people’s lands that could have been created by a landowner or an actual company. LandBox team will be creating strategic partnerships to help expand the possibilities inside the metaverse. An example of a partnership we could bring on a musician or a designer and they can set up a store highlighting their in-game items for sale.

Survival is key in LandBox players will need to do small missions looking for food, helping shops with a small task or even helping an old lady cross the street. You’ll earn the in-game currency. The in-game currency can be used in various ways.

Certain lands will have mini games as well that users can interact with. The LandBox game is an open world for gamers to enjoy the metaverse and creations at LandBox.

name: My Fantastic Ranch
description: My Fantastic Ranch is an easy-to-play game with a unique design. It is perfect as an introduction to management simulation games and for being immersed in a fantasy world filled with the most adorable creatures. Take care of your fantastic creatures, give fun lessons, become the most famous ranch in the kingdom and more!

name: Imperfect
description: You are not a good person. How did you get here? Use mysterious frames to find your way in a dark and dangerous landscape. The secrets to your redemption may be hidden in its shadows.

name: Touhou JRPG
description: The main character chooses three companions, advances through a dungeon, and defeats a boss at the far end of the dungeon in this RPG.

name: Double Barrel Mayhem
description: Double Barrel Mayhem is a shooting action game in which the player releases poor souls who have turned into evil sweets by shooting them with a shotgun.

1000$ – a first-person horror where you are supposed to rob a house. The main character is a young guy who decides to upgrade his computer due to the release of some new interesting games. However, he has to get 1,000 dollars somewhere to buy the required hardware. So he decides to rob a house where an old lady lives. But what he doesn’t know yet is that the lady always has a gun with her and doesn’t sleep at night.

name: Grover's Animal Adventures
description: Grover's Animal Adventures is a Sesame Street computer game starring Grover published by Hi Tech Expressions. The game was released for the Atari and the Commodore in cartridge form.

name: Sesame Street Pals Around Town
description:
Pals Around Town is a computer game published by Hi Tech Expressions in 1987 and programmed by Children's Television Workshop. It was released for the Atari and the IBM PCjr in cartridge form.

The basis for the game was strictly educational. The player could pick a character (Sesame Street characters available included Bert and Ernie, among others) and could interact with various objects in a variety of settings. Two such settings were a school classroom and an outdoor playground. Some items that could be interacted with included a fishbowl and a globe.

name: Obscura
description: Descend under a mountain to the marketplace below, where everything has a price. Meet the four men who can each give you what you need, but beware: they have their own hidden motives and uses for you. OBSCURA is a dark fantasy romance VN that asks how far you'll go to get what you need.

name: Anodia 2
description:
It's time to break the bricks in style!
Anodia 2 is a complete new take on the classic brick breaker genre. With every level unique and fresh you will always wonder what comes next!
While staying true to the first instalment's praised gameplay quality, Anodia 2 brings all new levels with a modern design and art style. Anodia 2 introduces new user experience concept that we call 'Just Play' -- simply hit the Play button, have fun and get the best high score.

name: Anodia
description: Sin descripción

name: Qorbit
description:
Qorbit is an easy to play arcade puzzler with interesting game mechanics.
Unlock cosmic objects which give you certain advantages in the game, collect points and start cosmic event and collect man-made space objects like the space shuttle!

name: Orange Jogger
description: A sports game from Sirnic.

name: Eggman Hates Furries
description: Eggman Hates Furries is a Game Maker-based Sonic the Hedgehog fangame made by Oddwarg, billed as "a 2D physics-based platformer which focuses on refined boss battles and stylish presentation". The plot is fairly simple, but not nonexistent. The story opens with Sonic racing Dr. Eggman to one of the Chaos Emeralds. Just as Sonic is about to claim the gem, Eggman overtakes him, violently knocks him aside, and claims the Emerald for himself. Sonic spends some time unconscious, and dreams of Eggman attacking and capturing his best friend, Miles "Tails" Prower. Sonic wakes up at his and Tails' home, and walks outside to find Tails making some adjustments to the Tornado before setting out on a casual flight. Sonic attempts to follow Tails, only to be confronted by Eggman, who promptly knocks Sonic off a nearby cliff. Sonic and Tails are quickly caught up in a deadly game of cat-and-mouse against Eggman and his many contraptions, fighting for their very lives.

name: Coerced Cage
description: Inspired by the pandemic lockdown, our main character goes through a period of isolation. Depending on player's choices, his mental state will result in 3 unique endings. Whether he escape his own house, or stay in for good... it is all up to you.

name: ZJ the Ball: Level 1
description: Sin descripción

name: Crabada
description: Crabada is an idle game available on most native platforms. Earn in-game rewards in exciting, idle gameplay as you send your Crabada NFTs to Battle for riches and glory!

name: Daimakaimura
description:
The PC-Engine SuperGrafx port of Ghouls 'n Ghosts.

Players progress from left to right (from bottom to top in level 3), and have to hack down the aforementioned monsters with a sword. The journey includes ledges, ladders, lava pits and slippery slopes. Different weapons can be collected, by finding suits of armor inside chests. Each of the five stages has its own setting and a final boss.

name: Gradius
description: The PC-Engine port of Gradius

name: Gradius II: Gofer no Yabou
description: The PC-Engine port of Gradius II: Gofer no Yabou.

name: Gradius II
description: The Famicom port of Gradius II.

name: Gradius
description: The NES port of Gradius.

name: Blade Fantasy
description: Blade Fantasy is an MMORPG mobile game with traditional oriental culture. The game is covered with amazing stories and play mods. Join in now and write down your unique warrior story

name: WALL-E
description: Go on a galaxy quest with WALL-E through eight exciting games. V.Smile V-Motion uses a wireless, motion-sensitive controller to help teach shapes, colors, matching, problem solving, logic, letters, numbers, puzzles and recycling. Featuring characters from Disney and Pixar's WALL-E movie, kids will have a blast getting into the action.

name: Dunkin' Match-3
description: Dunkin' Match-3 is a playable ad made to promote Dunkin'.

name: King's Quest Collector's Edition
description:
A collection containing the first six games in the King's Quest series which was released to celebrate the 15th anniversary of Sierra On-Line (originally founded as On-Line Systems). This collection was released alongside other well-known series from Sierra On-Line (specifically the "Space Quest" and "Leisure Suit Larry" series of games).

In addition to the first six games in the series, the collection includes the 1990 remake of the first King's Quest game, the French disk version of King's Quest V, the German disk version of King's Quest VI, a game called "King Graham's Board Game Challenge" (where you can play either Backgammon or Checkers against King Graham), archives of information on the King's Quest series, a trivia game with questions about the King's Quest series, and videos including clips of interviews with Ken and Roberta Williams and a preview of "King's Quest VII: The Princeless Bride".

name: Lagnacure
description: Lagnacure is a 3D isometric RPG where the player controls a group of characters.

name: Into the Sinkhole
description: “Into the Sinkhole” is a descending 3D platformer. With the help of explore-bot ‘Laika’, you will uncover hidden secrets that lie deep within the Sinkhole. As you traverse deeper into the Sinkhole, you will face springboard platforms that will try to push you back up.

name: Kawaii Hentai Girls 3
description: It's a relaxing anime puzzle with cute kawaii girls. Solve puzzles, and enjoy high-quality artwork.

name: Berserker: A Viking Board Game
description: A strategic and tactical board game for two players that has a timeless appeal and can be played over and over again in different variations.

name: TrainFormation
description: TrainFormation is a simple, fast-paced puzzle game created by one student as a university project. Place rails in front of an ever-accelerating train to cross procedurally generated levels, reach stations, collect power ups and make it as far as you can!

name: Reddoor
description: Survive endless waves of attacking zombie, earning points from killing.

name: Tina & Rook! Cookie Quest!
description: Two idiots are hungry for cookies after playing some games! and for some screw-up reason, you have to go through a whole puzzle to get that. Will these 2 idiots get to eat their cookies and enjoy their afternoon?

name: Beam Splitter
description: Place mirrors and beam splitters to redirect lasers in this relaxing arcade style game. How many levels can you beat?

name: S.E.C.U.
description: S.E.C.U. is a Roguelite FPS Game. descend to the hellish and demon infested lands in Rougelite Mode or Survive against waves of demons in Arenas

name: Get into Backrooms
description: This is a back room theme leisure games, Enter the back room, avoid the entity, find the exit, and find the truth. There are cakes, milk tea and party balloons =) There's nothing here. Don't believe it=( Join us =) Run away=(

name: Sono Higurashi vs. Touhou Universe 2
description: 90's-style 2D fighting action in which real-life men fight in cosplay. A major update version of the second series.

name: Japanese Escape Games: The Fortress Prison
description: The 8th Japanese Escape Games series!! Game system This game is an escape-the-room game (mystery-adventure game).

name: Mahjong Pirate Journey
description: Sin descripción

name: Laboratory Rat Escape Simulator Pro
description: Free your ratty friends and escape the laboratory!

name: Fashion Girls
description: Fashion Girls & Super Puzzler in one game! Calling all fashionistas! Classic Arcade Puzzle Game comes back as a mix between Fashion & Puzzle! In Fashion Girls you will become a fashionista trying to obtain new costumes and try to become the best photogra…

name: WorldWide FlightSimulator
description: Take off and land on more than 10.000 real airports all over the world. Choose one of 7 different airplanes to start your journey with.

name: The Little Plane That Could
description:
Board your biplane for some chivalrous dogfights in the sky.
Take part in aerial battles with up to 60 planes and show them how is ace!
May the best pilot win. And in case you are not the best pilot: don't despair, we have flight school lined up for you as well!
This super smooth biplane simulator comes to you from the author of the hit game 'The Little Crane That Could.'
`The Little Plane That Could' comes with eight challenging missions and supports Game Center for keeping track of your performance and achievements.

name: Silent Abyss: Fate of Heroes
description: The heroes who have fallen in rumors, now appear in this silent and terrible hell, greet their last fate! This is a dual-role Rogue-like game. Choose two heroes, use their unique cards and abilities to kill a bloody path in hell and completely eliminate the culprit!

name: Braveheart
description: Braveheart is a dynamic action / role-playing game with a unique combat system. King has sent you, the brave knight Richard, in search of the Holy Grail - an ancient chalice that has been protected for centuries by the most powerful creature on Earth, the Great Dragon! The king has promised the person who finds it not only half of the kingdom, but also his beautiful daughter’s hand in marriage. But uncovering this treasure will not be easy. You must use various tactics to fight the dangerous enemies and overcome the treacherous obstacles that stand in your way. Can you conquer the dark forces against you to find the Grail and claim your prize?

name: Warlock's Tower
description: Warlock's Tower is a retro puzzler with elegantly designed levels around one simple rule - one move equals one life lost. Watch your step!

name: That's a Cow
description:
Use the milk jet to fly around and defeat your enemies!
A super milky, super destructive & super fun game.
You play as a small cow that can fly on its own jet of milk. Rotate the cow to give her flight direction. Use the milk jet to move faster, fly higher, push physical objects, overcome various obstacles and defeat enemies with plungers (they are very cute and very fierce. Did I mention that they have a plunger?)
Collect all the coins and play on the special toy machine with toy cows. Unlock new cows and build your own special collection of cows. You could also win one of the very rare cows, with a unique jet (yes, there are cows that have more than just milk pouring out of them. It's amazing, isn't it?)

name: The Accursed Crown
description: The Accursed Crown of the Giant King is an old school role-playing game, single player, party based.

name: Hatsune Miku Connecting Puzzle Tamagotori: Snow Miku 2022
description: The new stages have SNOW MIKU themed eggs, birds, and berries! The birds in the puzzles are SNOW MIKU themed as well. Collect exclusive berries to find SNOW MIKU design birds and birds with special items!

name: Obunga
description: You're trapped in a giant maze. There's only one way out, but it's locked. Find all six keys to unlock the exit door and escape before Obunga catches you.

name: Vex 3
description: Vex 3 is a challenging platform adventure game. Make your way from one platform to the other and avoid deadly obstacles such as buzzsaws, spikes, crumbling blocks, and more! Run and jump to reach the flags. These are the checkpoints.

name: KiKi KaiKai
description: The PC-Engine port of KiKi KaiKai.

name: Taco Fun
description: Taco Fun is a retro rhythm game that lets the user complete a level with the controller buttons. Try to complete the level with your best time. Trophies are collected as you complete the rhythm goals. Single player fun and arcade style entertainment.

name: The Jumping Kebab
description:
Join BIG N on his exciting journey through the kitchen and make him jump!
Enjoy the colorful comic graphics accompanied by atmospheric music.

name: Round Invaders Red
description: Sin descripción

name: Drift Journey
description: Sin descripción

name: Pokémon Kanto Black
description: A ROM hack that puts players in the Kanto region, but encountering Unova Pokemon.

name: Alone in the Dark
description: Alone in the Dark presents itself as a reboot of the classic 1992 survival horror game featuring a noir-setting with horror elements and a moody atmosphere of darkness and shadows carried by terrifying visuals. The game revolves around investigating the environments for clues and solving puzzles to advance in the story, which the player can choose how much the game will help on finding these clues and where to go next. This reboot bears an interestingly similar fashion to the first games' mechanics but massively modernized and improved upon.

name: Space for Sale
description: Space for Sale follows the journey of an intergalactic property developer on a mission to build habitats for eccentric alien clients. Discover the wonders scattered throughout the new solar system you bought on the cheap, build estates and sell them for a sweet profit!

name: Sonic Epoch Advance
description:
Sonic Epoch features SatAM Sonic in a time travel adventure as he is blasted 10 years into the future; a dark future where Dr. Robotnik has essentially won, and the very few remaining Knothole Freedom Fighters are barely clinging to life. Sonic arrives to reinvigorate the world and perhaps still be able to fight back the evil Doctor and hopefully somehow get back to his own time.

The GBA version was a revival of the cancelled PC version. While the GBA version is "finished", it was a rush job, more for the sake of filling the gap of the previous version's incomplete status, and did not completely honor all aspects of the original story.

name: Tempest Rising
description: Classic RTS action meets modern production and performance in Tempest Rising. Inspired by RTS greats of the 90s and 2000s, Tempest Rising is a classic, base-building real time strategy game set in a modern day alternative history war scenario. It features 3 unique factions, each with its own approach to combat and economy and offering a variety of strategies for players of all stripes, deep and rewarding gameplay that keeps a focus on strategy while rewarding skill, and built-in customization options that allow players to approach the game their way in both single player and multiplayer game modes.

name: Wreckreation
description: Wreckreation hands you the keys to your very own driving and building open world called MixWorld! Explore 400 square kilometers of pure sandbox joy as you create, race and wreck alone or together with your friends.

name: Neon Dungeon
description: This is a neon style and fast-paced platform jumping game. In the game, you need to avoid many obstacles and finally reach the star of victory.

name: Microbes and Machines
description: Microbes and Machines is a rogue-like action game where you control a little bubble robot that fights against the forces of evil.

name: Lost Lands: Sand Captivity
description: An artifact found on Earth interferes with Susan's life and forces her to return to adventures. “Lost Lands: Sand Captivity” is an adventure game in the genre of Hidden Objects, with plenty of mini-games and puzzles, unforgettable characters and complicated quests.

name: Long Live the King!
description: Long Live the King is a story-driven RPG, where the player's choices will impact the story in major ways. Players must make decisions, pay close attention to character dialogue and actions, and decide who they can trust. Will you stand with your countrymen or your kin? The decision is yours.

name: A Simple Request
description: This place is full of mysteries, weirdness and inexplicable things. You come to the suburbs to a motel, you don't know yet that your friendly neighbors are not at all what they want to seem. Can you save yourself and keep your sanity?

name: Captroon
description: Captroon is an arcade game about facing waves of insectons, with a weapon and a shield that can be activated when available.

name: Mahjong Minimal
description: 100 hand-made Mahjong puzzles with beautiful abstract visuals and an ambient relaxing soundtrack.

name: Road to Newtopia
description: Road to Newtopia is a fan made game based on the cartoon Amphibia and inspired by several classic games such as The Oregon Trail, Earthbound, Kirby, and others.

name: Touhou Kisouken: Infinite Blade Pavilion
description: Touhou Project fangame developed by Len. Gameplay revolves around a combination of factors: a "Skill Tree" similar to that of Mystical Power Plant that increases by collecting leaf items, special attacks that can be used by consuming Skill Tree levels, and a "tension gauge" that increases or decreases the amount of items dropped by enemies.

name: Retro Goal
description:
Retro Goal is a mix of arcade soccer action and simple team management, from the developers of New Star Soccer and Retro Bowl.
With graphics inspired by football games of 16-bit era and modern touchscreen controls, you'll be slotting away goal after goal. Choose a team from the world's favourite leagues and recruit the superstars, professionals and hotheads who will lead to victory - then take full control on the pitch and make every touch count!

name: AN Escape Series #1: The Car
description: Can you get out of the car? The clock is ticking...

name: Undertale: Bits and Pieces
description: Undertale: Bits and Pieces is a mod of Undertale featuring completely overhauled graphics, new areas, new enemies and remixed music, as well as backporting content from its successor Deltarune

name: Yuukyuu no Eden: The Eternal Eden
description: Sin descripción

name: LEGO Batman
description: LEGO Batman is an unlicensed platformer based on the 2008 J2ME version of Lego Batman: The Mobile Game, released in Russia for the Sega Mega Drive in 2014 by BMB.

name: KiKi KaiKai
description: The MSX2 port of KiKi KaiKai.

name: Kiki Kaikai: The Bizarre World
description: The mobile phone version of KiKi KaiKai.

name: Space Quest: Collector's Edition
description:
A collection containing the first five games in the Space Quest series which was released to celebrate the 15th anniversary of Sierra On-Line (originally founded as On-Line Systems). This collection was released alongside other well-known series from Sierra On-Line (specifically the "King's Quest" and "Leisure Suit Larry" series of games).

In addition to the first five games in the series, the collection includes the 1991 remake of the first Space Quest game, the French and German versions of Space Quest V, an arcade game collection called "Roger Wilco's Spaced Out Game Pack", information on the Space Quest series, and some videos (including a spoof journalistic piece where the "reporter" interviews various people at Sierra On-Line), and a secret bonus program about the World Famous Talking Bear.

name: Sanguine Rose
description: Sanguine Rose is an erotic visual novel set in a gritty fantasy world. Follow a team of mercenaries as they find themselves trapped during a mission gone awry. Intrigue and debauchery await as a devious plot is set into motion!

name: Fire Emblem: Awakening - Project Thabes
description: A mod for Fire Emblem: Awakening which alters a range of things, adding new supports, weapons, classes, and playable characters, in addition to fixing story inconsistencies and rebalancing some of the game's systems and characters.

name: Prince of Persia CD Collection
description: A very spartan collection of the first two games in the Prince of Persia franchise as it contains no additional content. It also lacks any primary installer that is usually common with such collections; instead, each game resides in a separate folder with its own installer

name: Soccer Story
description:
It's been a year since The Calamity tore apart the very foundations of soccer as we know it, and since then, Soccer Inc. has made dang well sure that not a soul has been allowed to even look at a soccer ball, let alone kick it.

Soccer may have been banned across the world... but now there is hope! A magical soccer ball has chosen you, our Savior of Soccer! Soccer Story is a physics-driven adventure RPG, where every problem can be solved with your trusty magic ball.

name: Secret Command
description: A port of Rambo: First Blood Part II, without the Rambo license.

name: F1 Manager
description:
Manage your team through the 1996 championship and beyond. Choose to go for glory right away or build your team and keep it at the top for the next decade.

With full management control of engineers, contracts, sponsors, training, negotiations, drivers, merchandising, design, development, testing and race weekends it is up to you to get your team to the top!

name: Kite Fight
description: Kite Fight simulates kite flying using simple gestures and movements aided by the Move controller. Fly kites around the world and partake in the championships for the ultimate title of Kite Maestro!

name: SuperVHS
description: A mildly famous warehouse lurks somewhere deep in Milwaukee, Wisconsin. Hidden by relentless snow (or possibly that technology from 1994's The Shadow), spoken of only under whispered breath. Legends of sets, props, and bad movies as far as the eye can see. No one has returned from this place in a thousand years. No one...until now!

name: Duotone
description: Match the color of the ball with the next obstacle to keep on moving. Bouncing the wrong side of the ball off the opposite color tube will cause you lose your progress and need to start over. This game takes quick reactions and consistency - see how high of a score you can get!

name: Orcs & Elves II
description: Sin descripción

name: Puzzle Champions
description:
Solve the puzzles to obtain treasure and even save the princess from Goblins!

If you are trying to locate the actual game where you solve puzzles with lava, water, dangerous enemies, etc. then look no further! That is EXACTLY the gameplay you get with this game - nothing more; nothing less. Puzzle Champions puts you in control of helping our young hero work their way through various puzzle challenges in order to obtain treasures and save his love from certain death!

name: Al Andalus 711
description: Al Andalus 711 is a first-person graphic adventure game set in a historical version of medieval Spain from the 8th century. The player takes on the role of a young fisherman who will travel to a series of locations to carry out different missions.

name: Atuel
description:
A surrealist documentary game in which you explore beautiful, dreamlike landscapes inspired by the topography and wildlife of the Atuel River Valley in Argentina.

Perspective is fluid and interconnected as you shapeshift to become different animals and elements that form part of Atuel’s ecosystem.

Real-life interviews about the past, present, and future of the Atuel weave together to form a historic narrative about the intimate relationship between the land and its inhabitants.

name: King Arthur's Magic Castle
description: A children's activity game set in the world of King Arthur.

name: Melpool Land
description: Melpool Land is essentially an overhead fighting game between two characters in a small area. Each of the five characters is armed with two objects that they can use to hit their opponent or block attacks as if they were boxing gloves. The first player to reach three wins is the victor and it's possible to win by either emptying the opponent's life meter or by knocking them out of the stage. It is also possible to destroy the opponent's means of attack since they have their own health meters, leaving the opponent unable to do anything except try to ram their opponent off the stage. Arenas have holes and traps to look out for, such as bumpers and tiles that damage you, but there are no items or other abilities available. The story of the game is framed around a tournament hosted by a goddess that offers the winner anything they desire. Each character gets their own ending if you can complete the single player mode with them. A local multiplayer option is also available for two players.

name: Hello Kitty: Hello Kitty's Surprise
description: Hello Kitty is throwing a surprise party for her twin sister, Mimmy, and her friends are eager to help out.

name: Prestige Tree
description: Prestige Tree is an incremental idle game made for browsers by Jacorb, and features multiple layers of progression that compile upon each other in a tree format.

name: My Sweet Summer Oni
description:
Huh?! Ancient Demons aren’t wandering the earth… are they?

Join forces with three tantalizing demons eager to discover the modern world, while confronting their war-torn history.

One fateful encounter will leave you questioning everything you thought you knew about Oni…

name: Exit Path 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Doctor Who: Lost in Time
description:
Power-up your Waypoints to obtain the mysterious Vortex Energy, a crucial force used to thwart the Doctor’s most fearsome foes.
Travel to classic locations from the franchise, and team up with your favorite companions! Together you’ll face enemies like the Daleks, Cybermen and many more! Collect character cards and use strange new resources like Kyfred Gems and Henoch Matter to level up your companions. These resources are key to discovering why the Doctor and friends find themselves lost in time.

name: Biomorph
description:
Become Your Enemy in Biomorph, a 2D Dark Metroidvania!

When you defeat a monster, the BIOMORPH mechanic allows you to take its shape and power. But beware - biomorphing has a cost as these creatures will now unlock new skills and will use them on the player upon encountering them again!

name: Glorp
description: Glorp is a short 2D platformer created by Knocturnal Studios in which you play as the titular character Glorp, an incompetently drawn ball of slime journeying through a strange prism armed with just a flashlight.

name: SimTown
description: This port for the Playstation was only released in Japan 2 years after the original PC version. It features new graphics, re-worked interface to accommodate the controller, the news paper is replaced with a TV broadcast of the news, as well as updated sound.

name: Ctrl/Esc
description: Ctrl/Esc is a Survival Horror Game, where you are a technician, fixing stuff in a school, while exploring all the rooms and discovering some strange information.

name: Possessioner
description: Possessioner is primarily a Japanese-style adventure game. The player selects verb commands from a menu and combines them with objects appearing afterwards to interact with the environment and trigger events. Navigation is menu-based as well. The game also contains sporadic turn-based battles against the Possessioners and their minions. Four female combatants have a variety of attacks at their disposal, but the battles are fairly simple and there is no role-playing system. The game contains scenes with nudity and explicit, exclusively lesbian sex scenes.

name: Sniper Elite 4: Target - Fuhrer
description: Hidden in a forgotten corner of the Mediterranean, a secret Nazi U-boat facility threatens Allied shipping. When agent Karl Fairburne attempts to assassinate the base’s Commander, he finds his target already dead, executed in person by a shadowy visitor. Karl’s mission has changed: Target Führer! Destroy the U-boat base and take down Hitler in as many ways as you can in this replayable campaign mission for 1-2 players.

name: Bullseye
description: ◎ is a Yume Nikki fangame. The goal is to explore and collect LOG pieces (effects) while exploring Musubitsuki's dreams.

name: Hatsune Miku Connecting Puzzle Tamagotori: Kagamine Rin / Len Happy 14th Birthday
description:
The new stages have "Kagamine Rin / Len Happy 14th Birthday" themed eggs, birds, and berries!

Collect exclusive berries in new stages to find special birds and birds with limited items!
Exclusive egg designs and special events for this stage...!?

name: The Legend of Aurum Draconis
description: A medieval fantasy RPG-inspired play-and-earn adventure, set in an evolving digital universe replete with mystery, magic and danger.

name: Nekojara Monogatari
description: Sin descripción

name: Ultra Moto VR
description: Sin descripción

name: Don't Fraud My Heart!
description: Don't Fraud my Heart is a visual novel made entirely in Microsoft Powerpoint. It is a romantic, financially literate adventure that brings you into the exciting world of tax auditing.

name: Endometric Void
description: A sci-fi shooting game, with dashing and 'freezing time' to freeze enemies in place. There is simple hip-firing for each weapon. Lastly, it's a free-to-play game. Whoever wants to play it can play it :)

name: The Alchemist Shop: An Apprentice's Life
description: Help Faih to deliver well brewed potions to your customers in the best of the alchemist shops! Dive into an innovative experience that mixes Visual Novel and Solitaire. Make your choices, manage your cards and try to impress your master. Are you up to the task?

name: Christmas Shooter
description: it's a 2d game focused on Christmas where it's snowing and you have to shoot candy at people, the game should be fun and have nice music. Your end is a goal where you have to get all the way to the end and you have two endings which are secret and normal

name: Bounce your Bullets!
description: Your bullets get stronger and stronger after they bounce enough times. Bounce your Bullets! is a casual top down shooter where you survive for as long as possible against growing waves of enemies.

name: The Vaults of Minos
description: The Vaults of Minos is a fluid arcade Jump 'n Run with a gripping story and randomized levels. Every attempt to defeat your enemies will contain new traps, bosses, and challenges. Can you defeat your opponent and leave the cursed Vaults of Minos alive?

name: Krzyżacy: The Knights of the Cross
description: Krzyżacy: The Knights of the Cross, a deck strategy game, is the fantastic adventure story of against with Teutonic Knights on the run across Europe at the dawn of Medieval period, which also includes diverse decks, random plots, ups and downs story.

name: 1387: MMO Strategy
description: 1387 is a text based free-to-play MMO strategy game that is inspired by 2010's social media games. Manage your resources, train your army and found alliances or attack to other players.

name: Kolhii Champions AU
description: On the great island of Mata Nui, the matoran compete for honor and glory in the great sport of Kolhii! With the copper masks up for grabs, all bets are off in this highly competetive arena. This is where champions are made!

name: Temple of Starlight
description: Temple of Starlight is an abstract first-person puzzle game with a unique striking retro visual style. Use colored lights to clear obstacles and explore an ancient temple along with its forgotten history.

name: Jigsaw Puzzle: Beach Season 2
description: Jigsaw Puzzle: Beach Season 2 is a fun puzzle game with 500 photos, each an idea of how to have a fantastic time this summer

name: Mystery Solitaire: Dreamcatcher 2
description: Play solitaire and explore the secrets of the world of dreams! Master the art of solitaire!

name: Griddy
description: Relax, clear your mind and fill it)

name: Solitude Underwater
description: Solitude Underwater is a short horror adventure game. Two treasure-hunting brothers are searching for sunken riches off the coast of South Africa, only to find themselves immersed in catastrophe after one of them gets trapped in a cage, deep inside shark-infested waters.

name: Unstable Rock
description: The stone predicting the weather is out of order, now it not only predicts, but also changes the weather by controlling the direction of the wind, collects the remnants of its tiny fragments in order to gather into a large boulder and roll off into the horizon!

name: Public Restroom Simulator 2022
description: Public Restroom Simulator 2022 is a first-person-shooter that truly captures the feel of what it feels like to use a public restroom in the current year. You can either play one-on-one matches or just try to survive as long as possible in the single player mode. Either way it is gonna get messy.

name: Fantasy Climber: Fun Adventure
description: Fantasy Climber - is a classic platformer with modern design, honed game mechanics and retro aestetics. Each peak prepares new surprises and increases the difficulty of climbing!

name: Crossroads of Life
description: Crossroads of Life - a game in which you have to fight off waves of enemies while protecting your life.

name: Colorider
description: Colorider is a 2D shooter with a top view whose task is to clear all the rooms from enemies and move to a new room, which in turn will bring you closer to the final of the game.

name: WordSearch Story: Chapter 1
description: Reveal a hidden story in between the words as you solve each WordSearch. 30 puzzles included.

name: OMSI 2: Citybus S31X
description: They are considered a very successful bus series, the S31X city buses.

name: The Curse of Silent Marshes
description: You must save your friends from a vengeful voodoo spirit dressed as a circus clown. Move quickly and use your resources wisely in The Curse of Silent Marshes, a hair-raising hidden object adventure that will have you wondering at first who's on your side.

name: Flowers Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Arcade Paradise: Digital Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Soul Hackers 2: Digital Deluxe Edition
description:
The Soul Hackers 2 - Digital Deluxe Edition includes:
- Soul Hackers 2
- Bonus Story Arc: The Lost Numbers
- Booster Item Pack
- Pre-Order Bonus - Persona 5 Phantom Thieves outfits

name: Soul Hackers 2: Digital Premium Edition
description:
The Soul Hackers 2 - Digital Premium Edition includes:
- Soul Hackers 2
- Bonus Story Arc: The Lost Numbers
- Booster Item Pack
- Bonus Demon Pack
- Costume & BGM Pack
- Pre-Order Bonus - Persona 5 Phantom Thieves outfits
- Mary's Maid Frock outfit
- Ai-ho Demon

name: Verlore Tyd en Drome Bundle
description: Two abstract, ethereal worlds collide in this mysterious bundle, prepare yourself to be taken to 2 distinct realms that blend interpretive design and human curiosity into a unique combination of platforming, puzzles and challenges.

name: Master of Survival Bundle
description: Do you know the rules of survival? Will you get the last laugh in these scary, random worlds? The first rule of survival is——do not trust anyone nor yourself!

name: Cookie Gluttons TD
description:
The Cookie Gluttons lived joyfully and in harmony until all the cookies disappeared from CookieLand… Now, the starving Cookie Gluttons have discovered that there is another planet in the galaxy that has plenty of cookies… Planet Earth! They’ve invaded us and they are now inside your home!! And they are coming for your cookies!!!
To repel them you’ll count with eight types of towers, each one with several upgrades. It won’t be easy, they are many and diverse, and each different species has different skills… If they overflown you, you can still use lots of power ups to strengthen your defenses!
A game with cute 3D characters and scenarios that you will love.
A fun and adictive strategy and defense game!
You are the last hope to keep our cookies here, in the Earth, the planet counts with you!

name: Soul Unleashed
description:
Soul Unleashed is an Adventure RPG made just for those adults who may have forgotten what an adventure feels like.
It is a brand-new app inspired by the good-old days of gaming. Paying homage to the PC games of the 80's, it seeks to bring out the sort of board game feel you would find in tabletop RPGs and trading card games!

name: BackYard Hoops
description: Basketball just as you remember it as a kid. Older brother slamming the ball into your face not included.

name: Dexter Stardust
description: Space! Dexter Stardust barely escaped when the Vreesians, inhabitants of the menacing Planet X, sent a fleet of robots to destroy all life on Earth. Now, twenty years later, a mechanical man from the 10th planet seeks to communicate with Dexter a very important message - he is the key to saving both humans and Vreesians! Play the taco-loving Dexter Stardust as he, and his good friend Aurora, go on the greatest adventure of their lives and discover the mystery of the Robot from the Planet X!

name: Pitch Black: A Dusklight Story
description: This is the first installment of a six episode saga, and featuring around one hour of gameplay with features for replay-ability.

name: TerraGenesis: Landfall
description: From the makers of TerraGenesis comes TerraGenesis: Landfall - a free city-building simulator game in which you build and manage cities on planets in our solar system and outer space. Become the mayor of the first extraterrestrial human city and build it up to bring life to another planet. Create life in space and expand your civilization across the galaxy in this city-building simulation. Develop your city with new buildings and level up your new space society, design facilities, manage resources and keep your galactic residents happy and healthy.

name: Cyber Protocol Prologue
description: Demanding challenges, new traps and mechanics are easy to grasp but hard to master. Find a way to gather all of the coins and become the best hacker. Enjoy the 8 bit graphics of Cyber Protocol. The neon lighting, simple shapes and overall cyberpunk aesthetic, will guide you on your path.

name: Knight's Castle
description: Medieval Minigames for Toddlers and Kids!

name: Arcade Archives: Gun & Frontier
description: Gun & Frontier is a shooting game released by TAITO in 1990. Pilot the earth's latest fighter plane, Desperado, against the space pirates, Wild Lizard!

name: Hero Wheels
description: Drive at high speeds and take out the Boss! Dodge Enemies and bombs Take on new worlds Unlock different characters

name: Break Thru the Wall
description: It is a simple puzzle. It can be solved by aligning colors with panel slides. With your idea and thinking, Break thru the Wall.

name: Sweet Bakery Tycoon: Extended Edition
description: Start your baking career and prepare some delicious cakes for your clients, using a whole set of creams, fruits, and decorations. Test your skills on 60 diverse and increasingly difficult levels.

name: A Pointless Adventure
description: A Throw back to classic Atari adventure games, but with a completely ridiculous story.

name: Keeper
description: A simple but challenging goalkeeping game for the playdate. How many saves can you make before you concede?

name: Gravity Bandits
description: Find your way through a haunted castle, by manipulating gravity.

name: Morning Post
description: Sin descripción

name: The Jumping Kebab: Turbo
description:
Join BIG K on his exciting journey through the kitchen and make him jump!
Enjoy the colorful comic graphics accompanied by atmospheric music.

name: Nik and Kit Racing
description: Sin descripción

name: Black Diamond
description: Black Diamond is a built in game in TempleOS.

name: Shoot Run
description: Shoot Run is a first-person paintball shooter

name: Fruit Bump
description: In Fruit Bump you swipe and pop fruit through a ton of fun levels and tricky goals. The game has the exciting action of popular jewel match games but throws many unique twists in the mix to keep you matching.

name: Life Is Strange: Arcadia Bay Collection
description: Rewind time with Max Caulfield and uncover the secrets of Arcadia Bay alongside Chloe Price. Meet an unforgettable cast of characters across two gripping stories.

name: World of Outlaws: Dirt Racing
description:
Start as a local track racer and work your way up the ranks to become the next World of Outlaws champion. Upgrade your car, team, and facilities to stay competitive with the best of the best.

Race in both the premier World of Outlaws Sprint Car and Late Model Series, as well as 4 additional DIRTcar classes across more than 40 tracks.

Race at iconic real-world venues like Eldora, Volusia, Williams Grove, and more! World of Outlaws: Dirt Racing features 14 officially licensed tracks and many others inspired by real world venues!

name: T3D: Genesis
description: The best 3D puzzle game where you will maneuver a shaped combination of blocks falling from the sky to match other blocks and clear the layers.

name: That Golf Game
description: A light-hearted golf game with a focus on fun! Take your time and just play the shots - in tournaments, stroke play, match play, and more... Or drive your cart from shot to shot, cruising along at your own pace, or racing against the clock!

name: No Longer Home: Friary Road
description: Bo and Ao are the last ones left after a barbecue and find themselves stargazing.

name: Starvation
description: Sin descripción

name: NES Classic Edition
description: An official NES emulation system that came with 30 NES games in the form of a miniature NES system. Games output at 720p through HDMI, and the controllers re-use the accessory connector from the Wii Remote.

name: Hex Picross
description: A picross game on a hex grid with a beautiful minimal design and a sound environment prepared exclusively. Click to color the hexagonal cells so that all columns and diagonals are zero.

name: Super NES Classic Edition
description: An official SNES emulation system that came with 21 SNES games in the form of a miniature SNES system. Games output at 720p through HDMI, and the controllers re-use the accessory connector from the Wii Remote.

name: Hyper P.T.
description: This is a recreation of P.T. done in the HyperCard software. Some stuff is stripped back, some stuff is added; you'll just have to play to find out.

name: PlayStation Classic
description: An official PS1 emulation system that came with 20 PS1 games in the form of a miniature PS1 system. Games output at 720p through HDMI, and the controllers use standard USB ports.

name: Ribbit
description: Ribbit is a massive variety mod based on Deltarune Chapter 1, that tells an entirely new story about frogs, ghosts, and the strange powers that surround them both. Half a joke mod, half a character-driven mystery narrative, it is an experiment in seeing just how far Deltarune modding could be taken during the 2019-2021 period, retaining Deltarune's familiar locations, while inserting new custom scenes and gameplay mechanics into them.

name: Chinatris
description: Chinatris is a Tetris-like game about Chinese characters where you combine different Chinese character components to create new ones. To clear each stage, you must create the target characters. While playing you will meet many new and surprising characters that will give you a different look of Chinese culture.

name: Sega Genesis Mini
description: An official Sega Genesis emulation system that came with 42 Genesis games in the form of a miniature version of the original Genesis system. Games output at 720p through HDMI, and the controllers use standard USB ports.

name: Sanatorium: A Mental Asylum Simulator
description: Set in a fictionalized version of the 1920s where the lines between modern psychiatric treatment and pseudoscience are still muddy at best. Sanatorium is a 2D card-based workplace adventure where the player has to test, diagnose and treat patients. At its core, Sanatorium is a comment on the turbulent history of the practices and pseudoscience used to stigmatize mental illnesses.

name: Tetris
description: A port of the Sega arcade version made for the Sega Genesis Mini console.

name: Home From Work 2
description: You arrive home from work after a long and late night working at the office. Upon arriving home you begin to experience paranormal occurrences. You soon discover that you are not alone in your own home. You begin investigating but in doing so, you aggravate the demonic presence in your home. Discover what a demonic presence is capable of doing in Home from work 2

name: Home From Work 3
description: You arrive home after a long day at work to your new modern day home. You spent a few days at the home and everything seemed to be normal; but, today, you begin to discover paranormal occurrences. Walking, talking, strange noises and even moving furniture begin to happen more frequently. It is now time to see what evil spirit lurks in the third home in Home from work 3.

name: Bratz Fashion Pixiez: The Secret Necklace
description: In the educational game, you will be transformed into a Bratz girl. There are several games to choose from. You can earn style points to get get new outfits and change your hairstyle. The game also includes tips on social and beauty topics ad well as information about travel fashion and astrology. Then there is a quiz section, a studio where you can design Bartz fashion and a music studio. The game teaches children vocabulary, spelling, design, fashion, logic and music.

name: The Incredibles: Mission Incredible
description: Sin descripción

name: MoonPong: Tales of Epic Lunacy
description: A psychedelic Roguelite Pong'em up where you go to rescue the Moon.

name: Noah's Ark Animal Adventures
description:
When Noah hears a great flood is coming, he quickly builds an ark and gathers two of every animal on earth.
Hop on board the ark with Noah and the animals for a fun learning adventure!

name: Sofia the First Royal Learning Tablet
description: Explore fun learning activities with Sofia and her animal friends on the toy tablet that introduces letters, phonics, logic and music through 8 engaging activity modes. Sofia’s voice and charming melodies encourage playtime interaction and 5 character buttons engage your child in learning and discovery. With Sofia the First Royal Learning Tablet your little one is learning happily ever after!

name: Water Connect Puzzle
description: A puzzle game in which you must connect pipes of water to grow trees. Mix colors to create the proper color needed.

name: Beat MP3 for YouTube
description: Fun rhythm game where you tap along to the beats in your favorite songs found on YouTube!

name: 1112: Episode 01
description: 1112 invites players into the life of Louis Everett, an average man residing in the peaceful town of Jalonsville, New Jersey, with his curious wife. Despite his ordinary existence, Louis is troubled by constant headaches and mysterious dreams, leading players on a suspenseful journey to uncover hidden truths. In this game, you'll navigate through 15 detailed environments, interact with 8 distinct characters, and solve intriguing puzzles. The game's advanced graphics and original score create an immersive world, turning Louis's seemingly mundane life into a captivating, interactive mystery.

name: Mogeko Castle
description: The original Mogeko Castle, a horror game made in RPG Maker 2000.

name: Super Brothers Escape
description: Sin descripción

name: Hill Climbing 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Pool: 8 Ball Mania
description: An exciting game of billiards awaits you on a virtual table called "Pool 8 Ball Mania". If you are playing alone, you can play against the computer, and if you have a real partner, it is even more interesting. You will take turns making moves. Using a white ball called a cue, you have to hit eight colored balls into the pockets. If your move is successful, the next one will also be yours until you make a mistake. Fill all the round cells on your side with balls first and you will be the winner.

name: Fast Euro Train Driver Sim
description: Sin descripción

name: Crossy Zombie
description: Sin descripción

name: FMV Comedy Bundle
description: Wales Interactive is proud to offer the FMV Comedy Bundle featuring Who Pressed Mute on Uncle Marcus?, Five Dates in one bundle!

name: Litguy Adventure
description: Litguy Adventure is 2D Parkour Platformer Game Our young character realizes his new powers and Start on an adventure, A challenging adventure awaits him in the "Lit" Universe! Help him in this adventure!

name: Blob Quest
description: Guide your Blob through several levels in this adventure full of dangers, treasures and monstrous enemies. You'll have to solve many puzzles and prove your skills to succeed.

name: Puppy Balloon Ride
description: Puppy Balloon Ride is a fun game where you must navigate the skies, avoid storms, collect treats and guide Puppy through the maze worlds to get him home.

name: Webgeon Speedrun Edition
description: Webgeon Speedrun Edition is a Arcade Speedrun Game, You have to be fast, yes you have to be fast, Can you finish 20 levels in the fastest time?

name: Giana Sisters
description: The legend is back, better and bigger than ever before. To use the potential of current devices we improved the graphics and controls. Today the game captivates through its full HD graphic and a new userfriendly menustructure.

name: Crazy Wheel Rider HD
description: Go for a ride with Crazy Wheel Rider HD and be the fastest squirrel on earth.

name: Bubble Pop Letters & Shapes
description: Learn letters, numbers, colors, and shapes while having fun popping bubbles. Touch the bubble to pop. Learn uppercase and lowercase letters; numbers up to 15; the shapes including triangle square, diamond, rectangle, and oval; and the colors including red, green, blue, yellow, pink, purple, orange, brown, and black.

name: Kilubu Magic Potions 2
description:
Kilubu is a quiet village ...
Until a day of curious events happens: Renée can no longer sing, Tom becomes clumsy on the job, Emir is turning red ...
All the villagers are rushing to Sacha, the sorcerer! With his famous magic potions, he will stir up solutions to all of their bizarre problems!
Using the Magic Book of Spells and some clever investigating, players work with Sacha to make the right potions for people who need your help!
